name: Munite.net
tag_list: music, musicians, fans, artists, dj, djs, bands, upload, share, gigs, events, classified-ads-tracks, photo, talent, record-label, education, social-network, agents, labels, managers, video, audio, hosting, munite, munite-net, entrepreneurship
overview:
Munite.net is designed with the purpose to help discover musical talent, as well as connect industry professionals with agents, labels, promoters and managers. The site provides an arena to facilitate partnerships, build communities, source talent in a multitude of musical genres, as well as “Fortify” and “Strengthen” relationships with meaningful purpose. Whether your talent is singing, playing the guitar, bass, or drums; a musician, band, lyricist, or DJ, Munite provides the essential platform and sets the stage, allowing you to take your career to the next level.

Munite is a “People” company, conceived with the goal to â€œdemocratize and unite the music worldâ€ by making music discoverable. Partnerships extending far and wide are the new lifeblood of the music business. So join us, plant a seed and watch it grow. While other social networking sites are counting friends, we’re counting the ways how we can better serve and support aspiring musicians reach their fullest potential, whilst facilitating the creation and cultivation of life-changing relationships between those who make music and those who hope to discover them.

We’ve created a multifaceted online venue full of empowering resources, tools and knowledge focused solely on music. Join the “Munite Nation” and let us help bring ideas in your head onto the stage. Welcome to 2011 and Munite welcomes Musicians, Music Labels, Radio Promoters, Bands, Music Directors, Program Directors, Event Promoters, Disc Jockeys, Talent Buyers, Talent Scouts, Managers, Educators and Professors, Vocalists, Agents, Roadies, Song Writers, Publicists, Venues, Beat Boxers, Music Supervisors, Composers, Sound Engineers, Students, Fans, Groupies and much more.

In addition to helping aspiring musicians and working professionals, Munite also endeavors to â€œunite the music worldâ€ in classrooms and educational institutions across America. As budget cuts seem to be inescapable to every educational institution, it is unfortunate that programs for the arts tend to bear the brunt of the budgetary sword. With music education becoming increasingly underfunded in the school system, the likelihood of a well rounded education that includes music is becoming increasingly rareâ€”as well as the benefits that such an education offers.

Keenly aware of the current need to democratize music education, Munite is driven to make music education accessible for all students around the world. With the current trend of many schools turning to the digital classroom to facilitate access to education and knowledge, Munite is prepared to offer various tools at no cost to institutions, educators, and students, in order to facilitate an education in music to everyone who is interested in receiving one.

Everyone can benefit from using Munite. For an educational institution, it can be a priceless tool for pre-screen auditions. With just a click or two, schools can read the prospective studentâ€™s biography as well as listen to audition pieces posted by the student. As pre-screen audition pieces can be accessed through the Munite student services platofrm, CDâ€™s and cassettes will no longer be needed, thereby reducing waste. We will also be offering online live streamsâ€”allowing for auditions to occur in real time, thereby facilitating the interview process for the institution and the prospective student alike.

For educators, Munite offers tools that can assist in the classroom and / or move aspects of the classroom online. Educators can create an online forum, expanding the classroom to the internet. With Mumiixâ„¢ students can collaborate with their fellow students online and create new and exciting music and scores digitally. With Mumiixâ„¢, students will not only gain the knowledge of using online collaboration tools, but will also gain proficiency and awareness of the benefits that technology can play in the creative and professional process whilst preparing them for the twenty-first century.

With an online profile on Munite, students will also learn self promotion. Munite connects musicians and recording artists with labels, managers, and promotersâ€”just to name a few. Since students are able to create biographies and download resourceful media, this creates the opportunity for the music student to market themselves to their prospective employers and/or collaborators. As an online resume, Munite offers the student, musician and artist a professional forum for self promotion and marketing, increasing their exposure to the industry and evaluated experience.
